Smartbox is a global provider of smart locker technology. It provides a wide range of smart locker applications
that can be deployed in diverse industry verticals. This technology of smart lockers offers secure, efficient,
accountable, convenient package delivery and auditable asset storage while giving users 24/7 access to lockers
and the ability to track deliveries remotely. It is now working for rental services to provide these lockers for
certain time period to consumers to store their assets securely.
Technologies: - Smartbox Application is an Angular Application embedded with backend server based on Spring
Boot Application which uses Java with Hibernate & JPA, Spring Rest. It also uses IOT services to make this
